channel.title: Posts on Harshal Rathore
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Harshal Rathore

item.description: Git for beginners by me Set git user info (assuming that you are the only user of this System) git config --global user.name <name> git config --global user.email <email> User info for a certain Repository only git congig user.name <name> git config user.email <email> Initialize git before using git commands git init Add files on staging area to be committed/Save git add <file_name> git add . (stages all the files all together) See current git status

Linux SHELL Guide Shows all hidden files and folders along with normal ones. ls -a list lot of information about non-hidden files and directories la -l list above info for hidden files and directories too ls -la OR ls -l -a to switch to a dir same as cd but it just saves the path from which you came pushd <path> to switch back to dir from which you came with pushd.
